pageContext.claim: “And how long have I been talking about this?  Ten, fifteen, twenty years, I've been talking.  You know, some of you have heard me saying this as a private businessperson -- "We're losing all our jobs.  We're losing our companies."  They're coming back.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has talked about trade issues since he was a private businessman, but he continues to make the same error. He paints trade deficits as a negative, but in actuality, it means a country recieved more goods and services than it exported.
